thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Hamish Allardice

author: Hamish Allardice
title: Hamish Allardice
text:
I contacted Flashbay after a google search.
Allister was totally amazing.
The USB sample pack is a brilliant help too.
Nothing was too much trouble. He was really helpful and informative, easy to talk to about the whole range of Flashbay's products.
The USB sticks that were created are perfect and all the documents are ready to go. Thanks Allister for a great job done. I will certainly be back again..
